Author: Romanknickl
Title: [ANN][DLBX] â˜° [ ICO 11|19|2017 - 01|19|2018] â˜° DealBox
Body: The DLBX Token Rewards Program is a huge scam! wtf!  Below are the referrals who have signed up under your referral ID. To receive your 500 Free DLBX all of your referrals must have a valid email address and completely fill out their profile including their Myetherwallet.com wallet address. We have provided an email template to use to send to those referrals who have not yet completely filled out their profile for your convenience. Once you have reached the required 5 completed referral registrations you will be approved to receive your DLBX when we begin token distribution in late January 2018.  This is a scam!  They promised you 500DLBX for just sharing the Link. And now a few weeks later:  To receive your 500 Free DLBX !!!all of your referrals must have a valid email address and completely fill out their profile including their Myetherwallet.com wallet address!!!.  I am out of the project and disappointed! Hope this project will failure, hate such scam marketing guys....

Author: crypto mania
Title: [ANN][DLBX] â˜° [ ICO 11|19|2017 - 01|19|2018] â˜° DealBox
Body: We can easily assume that Dealbox is another outrage scam.  There is no activity from the team on all social media channels and what is worse they don't respond to emails. All channels are dead from June.  Even manager from Telegram gently abandoned sinking ship when he saw what was happening. I knew from the beginning that this will be a scam and tried to warn people but nobody listens. Even better I was banned and few members put me on ignore. I think is time to restore my account.  This was not possible that they could give to every participant 500$. No point doing ICO when you will give all your tokens for free because there will be no investors.  Why should one buy if you can get for free with little to no effort at all?  Scammers gathered millions of this useless tokens for sure. All was needed to create a few email accounts and send invitation one to another.

Author: Kleo-kripto
Title: [ANN][DLBX] â˜° [ ICO 11|19|2017 - 01|19|2018] â˜° DealBox
Body: I would like to know if there is anyone who has received a $ 500 reward? The fact is that it was not just 10 friends who subscribed to the link. it was necessary that these people confirmed the mail, registered on the site, entered all their contact details and the purse of the etherium.  Only then was the person counted. I have 16 people signed up and only 3 of them have fully contributed their data. This condition is very difficult to do, since it is difficult to force someone to spend so much time. It would be fair, dev, if you made payments according to how many people have fully confirmed their data. That would be fair.

Author: iwhoss
Title: [ANN][DLBX] â˜° [ ICO 11|19|2017 - 01|19|2018] â˜° DealBox
Body: ATTENTION ALL REWARDS CHALLENGE PARTICIPANTS We are keeping track of the # of referrrals you have via untorch.com - This week we will begin sending emails to registered emails for you to set your password and log into the DealBox platform. If you have met the required # of refferals and you have not cheated by setting up fake emails to register you will see your 500 DLBX show up in your account. Keep in mind, these are not yet tied to the mainchain and you will not see the DLBX show up in your wallet yet. We will begin distributing the 500 DLBX to recipient wallets over the next 4-5 weeks. You will need to set your password on the platform and provide the MyEtherWallet address you wish to recieve DLBX at in your profile on our platform. The grand prize for top referrer of 5k DLBX will be announced shortly after our token sale ends in January. We ask that you all be patient and bear with us during this process. We are working overtime to make sure things are getting put together properly. We sincerely thank everyone for participating and will keep everyone updated.
